channel.title: Lunar Spellbook Help!
channel.description: Hello, I am currently coding my server and I found out when I am on the lunar spellbook the teleports on the acient and modern spellbook aren't on the lunar one. Say on the modern and ancient one the home button works and goes to the home location but once i switch to lunar the home button doesnt take my home it just doesnt work. I am useing a 317 source and client, if any1 knows the problem please could you help!

It does matter. One thread per issue. Have a problem with it? Take it up with the Mods and Admins.

Um what it is tell me something i dont know
[/quote]

You posted this thread twice in the help section. You are only aloud one thread per issue. One will soon be locked, if not already locked.[/quote]

item.title: Lunar Spellbook Help!
item.dc:creator: @elite_expert elite expert
item.description:
@elite_expert wrote:

k1ng0frs:

I’m assuming that your using Project Insanity, You will need to find out the clickbutton Id of the Lunar home button. after that add it to your home teleport

Can you please go step by step so i know what to do exactly?

Read full topic
